title: Theatre for a New Audienceâ€™s 24/25 Season
description: Theatre for a New Audience is proud to celebrate its 45th season with American and World Premieres of three plays by Ethan Lipton, Wole Soyinka, and Taylor Mac, as well as a work by William Shakespeare. Experience the Bard interpreted with the same immediacy as plays written today.
address: Polonsky Shakespeare Center, 262 Ashland Place, Brooklyn, NY 11217
